user_query: I'm planning a music trivia game for a family gathering. Can you fetch the lyrics of famous songs by different artists? Also, provide me with interesting facts about the artists and their popular tracks. Additionally, recommend the top artists of the year to include in the trivia game.

TaskList.description: Fetch lyrics of famous songs by different artists.
Gather interesting facts about the artists.
Collect data on the most popular tracks by the selected artists.
Recommend the top artists of the year for the trivia game.
